about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Professional Restaurant System Solutions Provider
about.intro1: Weican is a technology company focused on restaurant system solutions, committed to providing intelligent and digital management systems for all types of restaurants. We have rich industry experience and a professional technical team, providing quality services to thousands of restaurants.
about.intro2: Our mission is to help restaurants improve operational efficiency, reduce operating costs, and increase revenue through innovative technology solutions, allowing restaurant operators to focus on providing quality food and service.

pos.title: POS System
pos.subtitle: Powerful Cashier Management System
pos.intro1: Weican POS system is an intelligent cashier management system designed specifically for restaurants, integrating multiple functions such as cashier, inventory, membership, and reports to help restaurants achieve digital management.
pos.intro2: The system supports multiple payment methods including cash, card, mobile payment, etc., with simple and fast operations, greatly improving cashier efficiency.
pos.intro3: Real-time data synchronization allows you to grasp restaurant operations anytime, anywhere, and make smarter business decisions.

feature1.title: Fast Checkout
feature1.description: Simple and intuitive interface, checkout speed increased by 50%

feature2.title: Multiple Payments
feature2.description: Supports cash, card, WeChat, Alipay and other payment methods

feature3.title: Real-time Reports
feature3.description: Generate sales reports in real-time, data at a glance

feature4.title: Inventory Management
feature4.description: Automatic inventory alerts to avoid stockouts

feature5.title: Member Management
feature5.description: Complete membership system to improve customer loyalty

feature6.title: Cloud Sync
feature6.description: Cloud data storage, real-time sync across multiple devices

benefit1.title: Improve Efficiency
benefit1.description: Simplify checkout process, reduce waiting time, improve customer satisfaction

benefit2.title: Reduce Costs
benefit2.description: Reduce labor costs, improve operational efficiency, lower operating costs

benefit3.title: Data-Driven
benefit3.description: Understand business conditions through data analysis and optimize business strategies

benefit4.title: Easy to Use
benefit4.description: Simple and intuitive interface, staff can quickly get started, reduce training costs

kiosk.title: Self-Service Kiosk
kiosk.subtitle: In-store self-service ordering terminal to enhance customer experience
kiosk.intro1: Self-service kiosks allow customers to complete ordering and payment independently, reducing waiting time and improving dining experience.
kiosk.intro2: Supports multiple languages, friendly interface, simple operation, suitable for all types of restaurants.
kiosk.intro3: Seamlessly integrated with POS system, orders synchronized in real-time, no additional manual operation required.

benefit1.description: Reduce ordering staff, lower labor costs

online.subtitle: Restaurant website and brand app, allowing customers to order online anytime, anywhere
online.intro1: Create a dedicated online ordering platform for restaurants, including restaurant website and brand app, allowing customers to browse menus and place orders anytime, anywhere.
online.intro2: Supports both delivery and in-store pickup modes to meet different customer needs.
online.intro3: Seamlessly integrated with POS system, orders automatically synchronized, no manual processing required.

member.title: Member System
member.subtitle: Complete membership management system to improve customer repurchase rate
member.intro1: Weican member system provides a complete membership management solution, including member registration, points management, tier system, marketing activities and other functions.
member.intro2: Through the member system, restaurants can better understand customers, provide personalized services, and improve customer satisfaction and repurchase rate.
member.intro3: The system supports various member marketing activities such as coupons, birthday gifts, recharge bonuses, etc., effectively improving member activity.

fast.title: Fast Food Restaurant Solution
fast.subtitle: Fast and efficient ordering and checkout solution
fast.intro1: Fast food restaurants need fast ordering and serving processes. Our solution is specifically designed for fast food restaurants to help you improve service efficiency and reduce customer waiting time.
fast.intro2: Through self-service kiosks and fast checkout systems, customers can quickly complete ordering and payment, and the kitchen can receive orders in real-time, greatly improving overall efficiency.
fast.intro3: The system supports features such as combo meals and fast order output, perfectly adapted to the operation mode of fast food restaurants.

feature1.description: Self-service kiosk, customers quickly complete ordering
